author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- Replace explicit forward declaration of the pat:: classes to using the Fwd.h files.
- Replaced explicit forward declaration of `reco::Track` with Fwd.h file. This is to help merging this PR eventually in to EVOLUTION branch.
- Removed unnecessary destructors declared in files that were changed.

This is in preparation for the change in EVOLUTION branch where stored data products in `pat::` will be moved to `pat::io_v`::`.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1862
resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1863
title: Added Fwd.h files to DataFormats/PatCandidates
